author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINS AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 11:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 21 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -74.0 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HEAVY RAINS AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER HISPANIOLA DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... As of 11:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 21 the center of Melissa was located near 14.2, -74.0 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
